2012-08-31.lead_paragraph: New data showed that economic and job growth remained modest, raising hopes for more Fed stimulus.
2012-08-31.abstract: Commerce Department reports consumer spending increased 0.4 percent in July after a flat reading in June; Labor Department reports first-time applications for state unemployment benefits were unchanged in the previous week at 374,000.
